TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit IndexedString extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a utility string class that is used by the class to optimize object graph serialization. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.IndexedString> class is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter> class to build string tables and optimize object graph serialization. <xref:System.Web.UI.IndexedString> provides optimization that allows the efficient storing of page state information that contains a repeated string. The <xref:System.Web.UI.IndexedString> class is not intended to be used directly from your code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string s) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.IndexedString> constructor ensures that the string passed is not `null` or <xref:System.String.Empty>, and then assigns it to the <xref:System.Web.UI.IndexedString.Value%2A> property.

Docs.exception: The string parameter passed to the constructor is or .

Docs.summary: Gets the string associated with the object.
